snippet.title: Natural Balance: Chronicles - Major Rendering and Level Design Improvements
snippet.description:
We have listened to your feedback and have greatly improved the game's rendering abilities. And thanks to the Unreal Engine 4, we have also added RTX support! Behold, a preview our crispy new level, Infernal Foothills!

Join our official communities for the latest updates and please share the video while we cook up more tasty bits…

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Tocino_Games/ (#NBCARPG)
Discord: https://discord.gg/QduFSKz  (Join now for Pre-Alpha Supporter benefits!)
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/NaturalBalance/
Website: http://tocinogames.cl/games/natural-balance-chronicles/

Natural Balance: Chronicles is an isometric Action RPG that is designed as a four-part mini-series. Each release will allow you to experience two stories that revolve around a pair of natural enemies.

The first game in the series is about the personal struggles between a fire wielding Pyrokin Elemental and a disease manipulating Virnox Primal, as they personally struggle with the hostile implications caused by each faction trying to maintain their respective energy levels.

Through their bitter tales, you will explore the various regions of their savage, alien planet. In addition to dealing with your adversaries, you will also battle wild creatures, learn about the mysterious world, and find items that will help you to survive, all while struggling to maintain a natural balance to the connected energy of your selected race.
